text: Hi, has anyone faced an issue in a custom coded section where the screenshotPath does not get changed even if it is already changed in the code?

<@U01J9BAEPFV> thanks for the follow up! I got it figured. That was a while ago now so I’ve forgotten the exact issue. I think I was using “sort by” instead of “order by” or something like that. It’s all good now though! :)
